history.proof: intros p a t Hrec. unfold udta_conv_1. unfold uad_conv_1. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term Hrec : reconnaissance p a t The term "uad_conv_1 a" has type "N" while it is expected to have type "Map prec_list".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> reconnaissance (udta_conv_1 p) (uad_conv_1 a) t

Premises:
udta_conv_1 = fun d : preDTA => M2 state (M0 state) (udta_conv_1_aux d) : preDTA -> preDTA
ad = N : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list
uad_conv_1 = fun a : ad => match a with | 0%N => 1%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~1 end : ad -> ad
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
u_conv0 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> reconnaissance (udta_conv_0 p) (uad_conv_0 a) t
u_conv0_r : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (udta_conv_0 p) (uad_conv_0 a) t -> reconnaissance p a t
u_conv_rec_0 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop
u_conv_rec_1 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop
dta_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
u_conv_rec_0_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p0 a0 t -> Prop
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
u_conv_1_invar_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_1 ladj0
u_conv_1_invar_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some (umpl_conv_1 ladj) -> MapGet state d a = Some ladj
u_conv_1_invar_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some (umpl_conv_1 ladj)
u_conv0_5r : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), u_conv_rec_0_r p a t r
u_conv0_5 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), u_conv_rec_0 p a t r
u_conv1_5 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), u_conv_rec_1 p a t r
u_conv_1_invar_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_1 ladj0 /\ MapGet state d a = Some ladj0
u_conv_str_1 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop
u_conv_str_0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
semantic_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
sem_equiv_prop_t = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t : term -> Prop
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
u_conv_str_0_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (s0 : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p0 s0 t -> Prop
st_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait d s t -> Prop
term_occur_1 : forall (t : term_list) (u : term), term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t
pl_tl_length_rec_4 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 p p0 t
upl_conv_1 = fix upl_conv_1 (p : prec_list) : prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a p0 p1 => prec_cons (uad_conv_1 a) (upl_conv_1 p0) (upl_conv_1 p1) | prec_empty => prec_empty end : prec_list -> prec_list
dta_rec_term = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => rec_term p a t (essence t p) end : DTA -> term -> bool
u_conv_lr_0 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop
u_conv_lr_1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop
pre_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait d p t -> Prop
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
conservation_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (l : term_list), prec_in_dta d p -> S (essence_list l d p) <= essence (app c l) d
u_conv_0_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p)
u_conv_1_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some (upl_conv_1 p)

```  
intros p a t Hrec.
unfold udta_conv_1.
unfold uad_conv_1.
apply rec_dta with (ladj := uad_conv_1 a).
- rewrite u_conv_1_invar_0 with (ladj := uad_conv_1 a). apply Hrec.
- apply Hrec.
```

original: intros p a t Hrec. unfold udta_conv_1. unfold uad_conv_1. apply rec_dta with (ladj := uad_conv_1 a). - rewrite u_conv_1_invar_0 with (ladj := uad_conv_1 a). apply Hrec. - apply Hrec.
